name: Mobile Lab 360
tagline: We design for a globalized world
description:
We are a young and professional team of Computer Engineering of IPN and UNAM. MobileLab360, we are an accelerator of business models via the mobile commerce, we work to create a more efficient electronic market, creating scalable and replicable electronic businesses for a vertical market that helps the entrepreneur with specialized advice to stand out in the mobile ecosystem.
We carry out 360 degree campaigns that try to reach the target audience with all possible mobile technology resources.
